snippet.title: Roll the Ball - Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2641460/Roll_the_Ball/

Roll the Ball is a casual game and has many similarities with amazing games we played in the past, such as Hamster Ball and Marble Madness. Dive into colorful and appealing visuals with three different biomes and bring the ball to the finish line on time! Roll the Ball will feature three game modes, including a story mode that brings a different play style.
